title: Wording on code samples in application form needs some clarification
body_html:
As it stands right now:

E.g., links to completed coding challenge provided by the mentor (if present), commits or pull requests on Github or other concise examples of your code. Links to GitHub profiles and repositories won't be considered. Please do not directly copy-paste code here.

A question was brought up on Slack that made us decide tweaking the phrasing to:

E.g., links to completed coding challenge provided by the mentor (if present), commits or pull requests on Github or other concise examples of your code (including links to single files in repositories). Links to your Github profile or to entire repositories won't be considered. Please do not directly copy-paste code here

Links to your Github profile or to entire repositories won't be considered. Please do not directly copy-paste code here
body:
As it stands right now:

> E.g., links to completed coding challenge provided by the mentor (if present), commits or pull requests on Github or other concise examples of your code. Links to GitHub profiles and repositories won't be considered. Please do not directly copy-paste code here.

A question was brought up on Slack that made us decide tweaking the phrasing to:

> E.g., links to completed coding challenge provided by the mentor (if present), commits or pull requests on Github or other concise examples of your code (including links to single files in repositories). Links to your Github profile or to entire repositories won\'t be considered. Please do not directly copy-paste code here
